    • Method Detail

      • getRoles

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getRoles()
        Get the roles defined in this token.
        Returns:
        non-null map describing the roles defined in this token. The keys in the map are the project names, and the values are lists of authority names associated to the project.

      • hasPermission

        boolean hasPermission(Permission permission)
        Check if this token gives the given permission, not taking into account project affiliations.

        This token must have the permission in its set of scopes. If it's a client credentials token, this is the only requirement, as a client credentials token is linked to an OAuth client and not to a user in the system. If it's not a client credentials token, this also checks to see if the user has a role with the specified permission.

        Parameters:
        permission - The permission to check
        Returns:
        true if this token has the permission, false otherwise

      • hasPermissionOnProject

        boolean hasPermissionOnProject(Permission permission,
                               java.lang.String projectName)
        Check if this token gives a permission in a specific project.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        projectName - the project name
        Returns:
        true if this token has the permission in the project, false otherwise

      • hasPermissionOnSubject

        boolean hasPermissionOnSubject(Permission permission,
                               java.lang.String projectName,
                               java.lang.String subjectName)
        Check if this token gives a permission on a subject in a given project.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        projectName - the project name
        subjectName - the subject name
        Returns:
        true if this token ahs the permission for the subject in the given project, false otherwise

      • hasPermissionOnSource

        boolean hasPermissionOnSource(Permission permission,
                              java.lang.String projectName,
                              java.lang.String subjectName,
                              java.lang.String sourceId)
        Check if this token gives a permission on a given source.
        Parameters:
        permission - the permission
        projectName - the project name
        subjectName - the subject name
        sourceId - the source ID
        Returns:
        true if this token gives permission for the source, false otherwise
